description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Nostalgia inducing retro-style 2D platformer! Jump, jetpack, and blast your way through 9 levels of traps, pits, and pesky enemies. Do you have the platforming skills to survive Super Robot World? Only one way to find out...
description.short: Nostalgia inducing retro-style 2D platformer! Jump, jetpack, and blast your way through 9 levels of traps, pits, and pesky enemies. Do you have the platforming skills to survive Super Robot World? Only one way to find out...
